name: Feed the Bird a Seed
description:
Join the adventure of a bird's search for seeds!

Walking and Eating

The bird needs to eat 10 seeds each level to grow and go to the next stage of its life. The bird will get older and slower as the levels continue. 

Obstacles to avoid

Don't forget to avoid obstacles. They are not good for the bird's health!

Bird through levels

There are three versions for the bird: baby, young, adult.

Controls:

walking:   WASD or Arrow Keys 

eating:       Left Mouse Button (or you can touch the seed with the beak)

Assets:

I made the pixel art & developed the game using Unity and C#.

I used music & SFX from different websites (Kenney's, opengameart).

Note: If you get stuck on the third level and can't control the bird, click on "Pause", and "Retry".
